content: So I'm working on #23365 to keep showing the user pill in the search typeahead dropdown even after the user is selected (draft PR #26360). There is a bunch of discussion related to redesigning the search. I don't see anything that directly conflicts with #23365, but I just want to confirm if we need to change anything in what needs to be done according to #23365.
We're doing a bunch of work to redesign search in https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/24345/ so your work should be compatible with that.
